attributes.action: Freeze all parliamentary expenses and allowances for MP's & Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As all Income Tax  Rates & Allowances have been frozen and an Income limit for allowances has been introduced (thereby increasing taxes for all in 2010-2011, Allowances and expenses for all legislators should similarly be frozen.

Such a freeze should also apply to all Quangocrats 

The current economic climate justifies restraint but only if applied fairly accross the board.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
